definition[0]: to develop over time and become a particular kind of person or thing
example[0]: Sue grew into a lovely young woman.
example[1]: The two-part show has grown into a full-fledged series.
definition[1]: to gradually learn how to do a job or deal with a situation successfully
example[2]: She will grow into her new role over the next few months.
definition[2]: if a child grows into clothes, he or she becomes big enough to wear them
